column4: Ok guys, I got a big one if anyone has any ideas. My /home won't mount, the partition is not listed in /dev/disk/by-uuid (I thought my fstab maybe got corrupted), I can mount it manually but I have to specify the fs type (mount can't find it), did both fsck and e2fsck, didn't help
I just did that, going to reboot to see if it helped
thanks, that worked. Simplest solutions work best I guess :) I'm just wondering why it happened in the first place
